channel.title: Deployment on Call me Yuvi
channel.description: Recent content in Deployment on Call me Yuvi

item.title: Website deployment using GIT
item.description: Once you’ve put in all the hard work of creating a website, you need to get it on the web so people can navigate to it and access its content. This process is called deployment. Deployment is a fancy word for “getting your website on the web,”. Website deployment isn’t a simple process, mainly because there are so many different ways to do it. In this article I don’t aim to document all possible methods.
